content:
ALEKS GROZDANOV - Charakterystyka zawodnika

Imi i nazwisko: Aleks Grozdanov (谢械泻 芯蟹写邪薪芯胁)

Data urodzenia: 28 marca 1998 (27 lat)

Miejsce urodzenia: Sofia, Bugaria

Pozycja: rodkowy (Middle Blocker)

Wzrost: 208 cm (niekt贸re 藕r贸da: 205-207 cm)

Klub: BOGDANKA LUK Lublin (od 2024, kontrakt do 2026/27)

Reprezentacja: Bugaria - KAPITAN

Status: 8. NAJLEPSZY ZAWODNIK WIATA 2025 (Volleyball World)

cie偶ka kariery - OD SOFII DO MISTRZOSTWA POLSKI

Levski Volley Sofia - formacja w rodzinnym klubie

Dojrzewanie do transferu 偶ycia

Nie ryzykuje gupio - mao bd贸w

Przyw贸dztwo - "QUIET AUTHORITY"

KAPITAN REPREZENTACJI BUGARII:

FIVB przed M 2025: "Supporting the younger generation are experienced national team stalwarts like captain Aleks Grozdanov, a powerful middle blocker known for his leadership and presence at the net."

M 2025 - LIDER MODYCH:

Bracia Nikolov (Aleksandar 21 lat, Simeon 18 lat) - gwiazdy Bugarii

Grozdanov (27 lat) - dowiadczenie i stabilno

"Quiet authority" - prowadzi przykadem, nie sowami

12 punkt贸w, 88% atak, 4 bloki

Poprowadzi zesp贸 do pierwszego finau od 55 lat!

Fina vs Wochy (1-3):

Srebrny medal - najwikszy sukces Bugarii od dekad

ROLA W BOGDANCE LUK:

Volleyball World: "A leader who lets his game do the talking, Aleks Grozdanov was a defining presence in the middle all season long."

Charakterystyka przyw贸dztwa:

"Quiet authority" - ciche przyw贸dztwo

Gra m贸wi za niego - przykad na boisku

Stabilno - fundament obrony

Dowiadczenie - 8 sezon贸w w elitarnych ligach (Wochy, Belgia, Polska)

Media bugarskie: "Grozdanov showed class, character, and consistency, became one of the stable names in coach Massimo Botti's selection."

Mentalno - PROFESJONALIZM I POKORA

O PLUSLIDZE (stycze 2025):

"The level is very high. In PlusLiga, there is no shortage of good foreign middle blockers, and there are also many great Polish middle blockers. Competition in such conditions is perfect for improving and constantly growing. Moreover, the volleyball atmosphere in Poland is excellent for the development of any player."

O POZOSTANIU W LUBLINIE:

"In terms of volleyball, it's truly incredible in Poland. This is the highest level. I think PlusLiga is the best league in Europe this season."

"I don't have any special plans for this year. I think one should work regularly all the time. There are certainly many things I can still improve in my game. However, that doesn't mean doing it from January 1st of the New Year, but consistently from the beginning of the season."

O PODEJCIU DO MECZW:

"Before the match, there is no point in saying whether the opponent is easier or harder. We have to give everything we have on the court and try to finish the matches as quickly as possible in our favor when an opportunity arises, to save energy for the next matches."

O REPREZENTACJI BUGARII:

"I'm definitely glad that many young and talented boys from Bulgaria are playing in foreign clubs, even in Italy and Turkey, which can give them more opportunities to play well in the national team."

Ewolucja kariery - DUGA DROGA DO SUKCESU

Bugaria (2016-2017) - FUNDAMENTY:

Dobrudja 07 - debiut w lidze bugarskiej

Puchar Bugarii 2017 - pierwszy trofeum

This current season, the Bulgarian player is even improving his performance. After the matches played so far, he leads the blockers' ranking with 29 block points."

Mocne strony - KOMPLETNY PAKIET

Wszechstronno - atak, blok, zagrywka na wysokim poziomie

Blok jak mur - 208 cm + perfekcyjny timing

Mistrz Polski w debiutanckim sezonie PlusLigi

8 sezon贸w we Woszech (Verona, Maaseik, Ravenna, Monza, Verona)

Mistrz Belgii 2019 z Maaseik

Kapitan reprezentacji Bugarii pomimo modego wieku (27 lat)

"Quiet authority" - przydomek od Volleyball World

Przedu偶enie kontraktu z Lublinem po 1 sezonie!

74 bloki w Ravennie 2020/21 - najlepszy w dru偶ynie

Bogdanka Volley Cup 2022/23 - gra turniej w Lublinie z Veron!

Georg Grozer - gra z nim w Monzie, teraz przeciwko w PlusLidze!

Wypowiedzi Grozdanova - filozofia

O PlusLidze: "The level is very high. In PlusLiga, there is no shortage of good foreign middle blockers, and there are also many great Polish middle blockers. Competition in such conditions is perfect for improving and constantly growing. Moreover, the volleyball atmosphere in Poland is excellent for the development of any player."

O Polsce: "In terms of volleyball, it's truly incredible in Poland. This is the highest level. I think PlusLiga is the best league in Europe this season."

O celach: "I don't have any special plans for this year. I think one should work regularly all the time. There are certainly many things I can still improve in my game. However, that doesn't mean doing it from January 1st of the New Year, but consistently from the beginning of the season."

O podejciu: "Before the match, there is no point in saying whether the opponent is easier or harder. We have to give everything we have on the court and try to finish the matches as quickly as possible in our favor when an opportunity arises."

O transferze do Monzy (2021): "Sono molto contento di giocare con Monza la prossima stagione. La reputo una grande opportunit per un giovane come me."

O modych Bugarach: "I'm definitely glad that many young and talented boys from Bulgaria are playing in foreign clubs, even in Italy and Turkey, which can give them more opportunities to play well in the national team."

Opinie o Grozdanowie

Volleyball World (grudzie 2025): "Quiet authority. Absolute control at the net. A leader who lets his game do the talking, Aleks Grozdanov was a defining presence in the middle all season long."

FIVB (M 2025): "The Bulgarian wall! ю Grozdanov led the tournament in block points (18) and scored 51 overall, anchoring Bulgaria's historic run to the final."

FIVB (przed M): "Captain Aleks Grozdanov, a powerful middle blocker known for his leadership and presence at the net."

Media bugarskie (maj 2025): "Grozdanov, who showed class, character, and consistency, became one of the stable names in coach Massimo Botti's selection. The Bulgarian international finished the PlusLiga championship final with 7 points, including 3 blocks and 56% attacking efficiency, showing composure and class in the decisive moment!"

Media bugarskie (grudzie 2025): "For Grozdanov, this is not a single recognition, but part of a series of stable and strong performances throughout the season. His inclusion again in the ideal team of the round once again emphasizes his importance for BOGDANKA LUK Lublin and confirms his status as a leading middle blocker in PlusLiga, as well as an undisputed leader of the Bulgarian national team."

PlusLiga analitycy: "The numbers clearly show why the Bulgarian middle blocker is a benchmark in PlusLiga. Grozdanov is #1 in block points (33) and simultaneously leads in blocks per set (0.69), which indicates not just accumulated statistics, but consistent effectiveness."

Podsumowanie - "QUIET AUTHORITY" OD SOFII DO WIATOWEJ CZOWKI

Aleks Grozdanov to historia cierpliwoci, konsekwentnej pracy i p贸藕nego sukcesu. Przez 8 sezon贸w budowa swoj pozycj we Woszech i Belgii, uczc si od najlepszych w najlepszych ligach Europy. By dobrym graczem, stabilnym rodkowym, ale bez wielkich sukces贸w klubowych.

Transfer do Lublina w 2024 = PRZEOM:

Debiut w PlusLidze = Mistrzostwo Polski!

#2 blokujcy ligi (99 blok贸w)

3 trofea (Mistrzostwo, Challenge, Superpuchar)

Przedu偶enie kontraktu do 2026/27

Rok 2025 - ANNUS MIRABILIS:

#1 blokujcy PlusLigi (sezon 25/26)

Srebrny medal M - pierwszy fina od 55 lat!

Dream Team M - Best Middle Blocker

Lider blok贸w M - 18 (najwicej w turnieju!)

#8 najlepszy zawodnik wiata (Volleyball World)

"QUIET AUTHORITY" - przyw贸dztwo przykadem, nie sowami

Blok absolutnie dominujcy - lider M i PlusLigi

Konsystencja - wysoki poziom ka偶dego meczu

Wysoka skuteczno ataku - 50-60% regularnie

Profesjonalizm - "work regularly all the time"

Pokora - "many things I can still improve"

Dowiadczenie - 8 sezon贸w w elitarnych ligach

Big game player - ronie w najwa偶niejszych momentach

Jest dowodem, 偶e sukces przychodzi do tych, kt贸rzy pracuj cierpliwie i konsekwentnie. Przez lata we Woszech budowa fundamenty - uczy si od najlepszych, gra w najlepszych ligach, rozwija swoje umiejtnoci. Nie mia spektakularnych sukces贸w, ale PRACOWA.

A potem przyszed 2025 rok i wszystko si zmienio:

Mistrz Polski w debiucie

Srebrny medal M jako kapitan

8. najlepszy zawodnik wiata

"Quiet authority. Absolute control at the net. A leader who lets his game do the talking."

To nie przypadek. To wynik lat ci偶kiej pracy, profesjonalizmu i pokornej determinacji.

Aleks Grozdanov = Blok + Konsystencja + "Quiet Authority" + Profesjonalizm
